name: Universe Test
description:
Main menu

  • Space to enter with current seed.
  • P to pause and play music.
  • O to change music.
  • Escape to exit the game.

Universe map

  • Click on a star to enter its star system!
  • Space to generate a new random universe.
  • R to regenerate the original universe.
  • Click on the universe seed to copy it to the clipboard.
  • Use the menu on the top left to generate a universe with a custom seed.
  • P and O to control music.
  • Escape to go back to the menu.

Star system map

  • Click on a planet to enter it!
  • Space to generate a new random star system with the same star type.
  • R to regenerate the original star system.
  • Click on the star system seed to copy it to the clipboard.
  • Use the menu on the top left to generate a star system with a custom seed.
  • P and O to control music.
  • Escape to exit the star system.

Planetary map

  • Space to generate a new random world of the same world type!
  • R to regenerate the original world.
  • Click on the world seed to copy it to the clipboard.
  • Use the menu on the top left to generate a world with a custom seed.
  • P and O to control music.
  • Escape to exit the planet.
  • Full fledged procedural generation of universes!
  • Procedural star system generation!
  • Procedural world generation!
  • You can enter a star system by clicking a star, and enter a world by clicking it!
  • You can share your seeds with friends, or save them for later!
  • The same universe seed generates the same universe, with the same star systems and planets!

This is just a prototype of a game idea I had in mind for later. Hope you enjoy exploring the universe with me!

Know bugs

For some reason I seem to be unable to export to Windows, whenever I try to, it throws hundreds of errors! So, for now at least, the latest versions can be played only on the web browser and on Linux.

Acknowledgments

This project was made thanks to Godot, DeepFold's PixelPlanetGenerator, and DeepFold's SpaceBackgroundGenerator!
